item.title: Setting up a Nested vSphere 7 / VCMA 7 Lab
item.description: Introduction Welcome to this tutorial on establishing a VMware vSphere 7 and vCenter Server Appliance (VCMA) 7 lab on a Windows 11 system. Our aim is to create a functional virtual lab environment using VMware Player 17, focusing primarily on VMware’s virtualization technologies. We will set up two ESXi 7 hosts, providing a hands-on experience with VMware’s advanced virtualization platform in a nested virtualization context.
